en.desc: References can appear after period without space. Example: Hydrogen is a gas.[1] It is ...
en.source: Sentence one.reference Starts with reference
en.result: Sentence one.reference Starts with reference

en.desc: References can appear after period without space, repeated. Example: Hydrogen is a gas.[1][2][3] It is ...
en.source: Sentence one.123 Starts with reference
en.result: Sentence one.123 Starts with reference

en.desc: References can appear inside a sentence. Example: Hydrogen is a gas[1] and it is ...

en.desc: References can appear inside a sentence. Example:Hydrogen's atomic number is one. Hydrogen is a gas[1] and it is ..... Test the flags are reset properly

en.desc: References can appear repeated inside a sentence. Example: Hydrogen is a gas[1][2][3] and it is ...

en.result: Sentence one123 and rest of sentence

en.desc: References can appear after period and space. Example: Hydrogen is a gas. [1] It is .... In this case we dont have any choice than considering [1] as part of second sentence

hi.source: माउज़र पिस्तौल (अंग्रेजी: Mauser C96) मूल रूप से जर्मनी में बनी एक अर्द्ध स्वचालित पिस्तौल है। इस पिस्तौल का डिजाइन जर्मनी निवासी दो माउज़र बन्धुओं ने सन् 1895 में तैयार किया था।
hi.result: माउज़र पिस्तौल (अंग्रेजी: Mauser C96) मूल रूप से जर्मनी में बनी एक अर्द्ध स्वचालित पिस्तौल है। इस पिस्तौल का डिजाइन जर्मनी निवासी दो माउज़र बन्धुओं ने सन् 1895 में तैयार किया था।
